titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation. James R. Whereas by an act of Parliament made in this kingdom in the 14th and 15th years of the reign of our late dear brother of blessed memory, it is among other things enacted, that for all forreign commodities ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook the assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Andrew Crook at his Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and opening lines of text.
"Given at our court at our Castle of Dublin the tenth day of January. 1689.".
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
